fin_intro:
wins the game !
Press the SPACE key to start.
controlsj1: Press the W and S keys to move player 1
controlsj2: and the UP and DOWN keys to move player 2 !
continue: Press the SPACE key to continue !
need_login: You need to be logged in
next_game2: will face each other in the next match
inside: You are already in a tournament
alias: The Alias is already taken or you're already inside this tournament
host: You are the host, game is launching
not_host: You are not the host, please go to
busy: The server is busy, please try again later
network: Network error. Please check your connection.
valid: Please enter a valid username (alphanumeric characters only).
len_error: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
mail_novalid: Please enter a valid email address.
invalid_phone: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number.
valid_user: Please enter a valid username (alphanumeric characters only).
verif_code_error: Please enter a valid verification code. It should be 6 digits (only) long.
move_buttons: The movement keys are as follows:
1_button: The configuration is in 1 button mode.
on_press: Each time you press your button, your racket will move in the opposite direction from the previous time.
engage: At the start of the game, the ball has a value of 0.
on_bounce: With each bounce, the ball's value increases by 1.
on_bounce2: All players who have touched the ball will not be able to touch it on its next bounce.
on_exit: But if it touches the edge of the field, all of them will share its value, and it will drop back to 0.
multi_to_get: The game ends when a player reaches
multi_to_get2: points and is alone in the lead with at least
welcome_multi: Welcome to our multiplayer game variant.
goal_1: The goal of the game is to exceed
goal_2: points and to be alone in the lead with at least
pause_button: The Space key will be used to pause.
rules_button: The Esc key will display the rules.
resume_button: To resume the match, press space.
restart_button: Press the SPACE key to return to the main menu
please_login: Please log in to access this feature
NetError: Network error. Please check your connection.
Invalid value for two_factor. It must be: Invalid value for two_factor. It must be a boolean.
An error occurred while updating 2FA pre: An error occurred while updating 2FA preference.
An unexpected error occurred. Please try: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
A user with that username already exists: A user with that username already exists.
to_show_rules: To display the rules, press the ESC key
